Body:
I was trying to create Virtual Network (using #terraform), but this operation failed with error message “Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription”.

Here is the complete Error: creating/updating App Service VNet association between “res-fnc-uat” (Resource Group “res-uat”) and Virtual Network “res-vnet-uat”: web.AppsClient#CreateOrUpdateSwiftVirtualNetworkConnectionWithCheck: Failure responding to request: StatusCode=400 — Original Error: autorest/azure: Service returned an error. Status=400 Code=”BadRequest” Message=”Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription.” Details=[{“Message”:”Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription.”},{“Code”:”BadRequest”},{“ErrorEntity”:{“Code”:”BadRequest”,”ExtendedCode”:”52018",”Message”:”Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription.”,”MessageTemplate”:”Feature {0} is not allowed for a free trial subscription.”,”Parameters”:[“Create Swift Virtual Network”]}}]

│with module.modules.azurerm_app_service_virtual_network_swift_connection.network-swiftcon,

│ on ../../modules/networking.tf line 51, in resource “azurerm_app_service_virtual_network_swift_connection” “network-swiftcon”: │ 51: resource “azurerm_app_service_virtual_network_swift_connection” “network-swiftcon” {

I was not aware about the solution.
Title: Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription

comments.Text: " is not allowed for a free trial subscription" - what is not clear about that?

history.Text: Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription

filtered-sentences.text: Feature Create Swift Virtual Network is not allowed for a free trial subscription

answers.Body:
There are limitations for trial subscriptions.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/azure-subscription-service-limits#app-service-limits

For App Services, you can't enable Vnet Integration, for any App Service SKU.

If you want to test this feature, you need a "Pay as you go" subscription.

comments.Text: I'm on a "Pay as you go" subscription and am getting this error.

filtered-sentences.text: I'm on a "Pay as you go" subscription and am getting this error.

history.Text:
There are limitations for trial subscriptions. 

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/azure-subscription-service-limits#app-service-limits

For App Services, you can't enable Vnet Integration, for any App Service SKU.

[![enter image description here][1]][1]


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/3X3Jc.png

If you want to test this feature, you need a "Pay as you go" subscription.
